H0.text: Which town was the birthplace of David Garrick. Lichfield

H1.text: Which town was the birthplace of David Garrick. Stratford-upon-Avon

H2.text: Which town was the birthplace of David Garrick. London

H3.text: Which town was the birthplace of David Garrick. HEREFORD

A4.text: David Garrick was born at the Angel Inn, Widemarsh Street, Hereford in 1716

A5.text: Some time after David Garrick's birth the family moved to Lichfield, home to his mother
